name: Glow Unblock HD Free
description:
This is a free version of Glow Unblock with a limited levels.

Included Two Game
Unblock Me and Move Me Out !

Have you played unblock game before? if not, Unblcok Me easy mode is the best choice to get start, or chose hard level to play.

Need a challenge for a unblock game?
Klotski contains 6 packs of increasing difficulty. Some levels need hundred
moves to finish at least!

What is Klotski?

Klotski is a small brick puzzle. The aim is to release a red block and move it to a destination gate by moving other surrounding pieces, within a confined outer border. It sounds simple but it's a real brainteaser, especially the Forget-me-not brick layout.


Control

In the game you should move red block to exit.

Drag red block and move it through to the opening on the right in Unblock Me game or on the bottom in Klotski game.

Remember

In Unblock me game, vertical blocks can move only up and down and horizontal blocks can move only left and right.

In Klotski game, blocks can go anywhere if there enough space.
